title: Secrets & Lies
description: In this Dateline classic, a woman is found dead in the debris of her house that burned to the ground early one frigid morning in a small rural New York town. Andrea Canning reports. Originally aired on NBC on November 6, 2013.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
